entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Churchill Falls
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
